languages.text: {n}Ксенос замирает и пристально смотрит на вас. Он явно не привык к тому, что кто-либо может столь умело и быстро ориентироваться в лабиринтах его речи. Наконец, из-за его маски раздается низкий смех и он несколько раз медленно хлопает в ладоши, произнеся лишь одно слово:{/n} "Браво".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос замирает и пристально смотрит на вас. Он явно не привык к тому, что кто-либо может столь умело и быстро ориентироваться в лабиринтах его речи. Наконец, из-за его маски раздается низкий смех и он несколько раз медленно хлопает в ладоши, произнеся лишь одно слово:{/n} "Браво".
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос замирает и пристально смотрит на вас. Он явно не привык к тому, что кто-либо может столь умело и быстро ориентироваться в лабиринтах его речи. Наконец, из-за его маски раздается низкий смех и он несколько раз медленно хлопает в ладоши, произнеся лишь одно слово:{/n} "Браво".

At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|а}."

At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}这个异形愣在了那里，认认真真地打量着你。很显然，他没想到居然有人能如此迅速而巧妙地理解他的谜语。到最后，你听到他的面具后面传来了低沉的笑声。眼前的异形慢慢地拍了拍手，只说了三个字。{/n}“了不起。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个异形愣在了那里，认认真真地打量着你。很显然，他没想到居然有人能如此迅速而巧妙地理解他的谜语。到最后，你听到他的面具后面传来了低沉的笑声。眼前的异形慢慢地拍了拍手，只说了三个字。{/n}“了不起。”
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}El xenos se detiene y te mira con atención. Comprendes que no está acostumbrado a que alguien navegue por sus laberintos verbales con esa habilidad y rapidez. Finalmente, oyes una risa grave tras la máscara seguida de un lento aplauso y una sola palabra:{/n} «Bravo».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos se detiene y te mira con atención. Comprendes que no está acostumbrado a que alguien navegue por sus laberintos verbales con esa habilidad y rapidez. Finalmente, oyes una risa grave tras la máscara seguida de un lento aplauso y una sola palabra:{/n} «Bravo».
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}異種族は立ち尽くしたまま、こちらをジッと見つめる。彼の謎かけを即座に理解する人物とは滅多に会わないようだ。ようやく、彼の仮面の奥からくすくすと笑う声が聞こえ、ゆっくりと手を叩きながら一言だけ発した。{/n}「素晴らしい」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は立ち尽くしたまま、こちらをジッと見つめる。彼の謎かけを即座に理解する人物とは滅多に会わないようだ。ようやく、彼の仮面の奥からくすくすと笑う声が聞こえ、ゆっくりと手を叩きながら一言だけ発した。{/n}「素晴らしい」
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos hält inne und blickt dich eindringlich an. Er ist es offenkundig nicht gewohnt, dass jemand so behände und schnell einen Weg durch seine verbalen Labyrinthe findet. Schließlich hörst du hinter seiner Maske ein leises Lachen, und der Xenos legt langsam die Hände zusammen und sagt nur ein einziges Wort:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos hält inne und blickt dich eindringlich an. Er ist es offenkundig nicht gewohnt, dass jemand so behände und schnell einen Weg durch seine verbalen Labyrinthe findet. Schließlich hörst du hinter seiner Maske ein leises Lachen, und der Xenos legt langsam die Hände zusammen und sagt nur ein einziges Wort:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|а}."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}Le xénos s'immobilise et vous fixe d'un regard intense. De toute évidence, il n'a pas l'habitude que l'on sorte aussi vite et adroitement de ses dédales verbaux. Au bout de quelques instants, vous entendez un petit rire derrière le masque et le xénos applaudit lentement en disant un seul mot :{/n} « Bravo. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos s'immobilise et vous fixe d'un regard intense. De toute évidence, il n'a pas l'habitude que l'on sorte aussi vite et adroitement de ses dédales verbaux. Au bout de quelques instants, vous entendez un petit rire derrière le masque et le xénos applaudit lentement en disant un seul mot :{/n} « Bravo. »
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text: {n}Sessizliğe bürünen zeno, dikkatle sana bakıyor. Sözleriyle inşa ettiği labirentleri böylesine ustaca ve hızla aşabilenlere alışkın olmadığı belli. En sonunda maskenin ardından gelen, hafif bir kıkırdama duyuyorsun. Zeno, seni alkışlayarak tek bir söz söylüyor.{/n} "Bravo."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos stills and looks at you intently. He is not accustomed to anyone so adroitly and quickly navigating his verbal labyrinths, that much is clear. At last, you hear a low chuckle behind his mask and the xenos claps his hands slowly, saying only one word:{/n} "Brav{mf|o|a}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno, sessizliğe bürünerek dikkatlice sana bakıyor. Sözleriyle inşa ettiği labirentleri böylesine bir ustalık sergileyerek hızlıca aşabilenlere alışkın olmadığı belli. En sonunda maskenin ardından gelen hafif bir kıkırdama duyuyorsun. Zeno, seni alkışlayarak tek bir söz söylüyor.{/n} "Bravo."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
